summary: This document appears to be an internal incident report from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York regarding a procedural error in logging for an inmate on suicide watch. The wrong logbook (I/M companion log) was initially used instead of the proper Staff Suicide Watch log, and the error was later corrected.

events.title: Procedural Error in Suicide Watch Logging
events.description: An inmate (C/O) was assigned to staff suicide watch, but the wrong logbook (I/M companion log) was used initially. The error was discovered, and a second, correct log was completed using the proper Staff Suicide Watch log.

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York
locations.context: The federal detention facility where the incident report was generated.

keyFacts: A procedural error occurred at MCC New York where the wrong logbook was used for an inmate on suicide watch.
The error was discovered and corrected by completing a second, proper log (the Staff Suicide Watch log).
A staff member initialed 'M' on the corrected log entries.
The document is marked as CONFIDENTIAL and is part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) case files.
